name: luna-ipfs

scripts.test: NODE_OPTIONS='--import "data:text/javascript,import { register } from \"node:module\"; import { pathToFileURL } from \"node:url\"; register(\"ts-node/esm\", pathToFileURL(\"./\"));"' ts-mocha --require ts-node/register tests/**/*.ts
scripts.test:dev: NODE_OPTIONS='--import "data:text/javascript,import { register } from \"node:module\"; import { pathToFileURL } from \"node:url\"; register(\"ts-node/esm\", pathToFileURL(\"./\"));"' ts-mocha tests/test.ts

author: Kumar Anirudha (@anistark)
description: Luna - A TypeScript SDK for uploading files & directories to IPFS using Helia.
